# Class TTS

Class for text-to-speech processing. Provides functionality to convert text into synthesized speech audio.

##### Index

### Methods

destroy synthesizeSpeech

## Methods

### destroy

  * destroy(): void

Cleans up resources associated with this TTS instance.

#### Returns void




### synthesizeSpeech

  * synthesizeSpeech(speakerId: string, text: string): Promise<[TTSIterator](/interfaces/primitives_tts_tts.TTSIterator)>

Synthesizes speech from text using a specified voice.

#### Parameters

    * speakerId: string

ID of the speaker/voice to use for synthesis

    * text: string

Text to convert to speech

#### Returns Promise<[TTSIterator](/interfaces/primitives_tts_tts.TTSIterator)>

A stream iterator for the synthesized audio chunks

#### Throws

InworldError if speech synthesis fails




### Settings

Member Visibility

  * Protected
  * Inherited
  * External
